snippet.title: NBA 2K12 - Controls Trailer (XBOX 360)
snippet.description:
Want to dominate the court in NBA 2K12? The controls trailer will give you the edge. NBA 2K12 is available in stores everywhere 10/4/2011 and can be pre-ordered here - http://2kgam.es/BuyNBA2K12Now. 

The latest NBA 2K12 news can be found at http://2kgam.es/NBA2K12. MJ is back and he brought some friends along. The new ControlsTrailer will teach you the intricacies of the all-new Post Game (http:2kgam.es/NBA2K12DI8), Defense (http:2kgam.es/NBA2K12DI9), Dribbling (http:2kgam.es/NBA2K12DI10), & Shooting systems.

ESRB Rating: Everyone
